column3: Latest;Kampong Cham: Two people were seriously injured  after unknown men fired guns at the victims who were riding a motorbike. The incident happened at 00.30 on March 31 2019
column4: outside a KTV in Veal Vong.------After receiving this information
column5: police went the scene at “Family” Karaoke House.------Police said that of the two victims on the motorbike one was seriously injured with a gunshot wound
column6: and another suffered minor trauma.------Police are investigating.------*Original report said PP
column7: but seems there is a Veal Vong in Kmapong Cham. Apologies.------ ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/70027------https://postnews.com.kh/local/426741
